string-array.name: stremers_about
string-array.item: Welcome! My name is Serge, and this channel is dedicated to the game Warface, but you can also meet other interesting games. Here you will find hot Letsplay, Reviews, Tricks and Guides.
On our channel you can find news about the game, gameplay video, reports from events, live broadcasts and more.
Hello world! My Name is Serge, Im known as MS-Serge I do videos Warface.
Welcome! My name is Razor and on my channel I post videos on the game Warface and not only. Here you will find a lot of commercials analytical content, as well as show Varfeys
Monter Arts releases video for popular online games, like CS:GO, GTA 5, Warface. On the channel you will find funny videos and cutting, reviews and guides, frag movie and nice moments.
Hello ardent fan of varfeys! My name is Donika and I rented an interesting video for our beloved game! Top 5 best clips of the week, music warface, top 5 funny videos from the game!
Welcome to StarGameWF, videos come out every day at 9:00 GMT and wish you a pleasant viewing and spending time on the channel.
